hero.title: CONNECTING
hero.description: Strengthening communities through intergenerational dialogue, healthy habits and sustainable lifestyle. Join our mission to create healthier and closer communities.

aboutUs.title: HUNDREDS OF PEOPLE CREATE NEW CONNECTIONS

benefit1.title: Community Strengthening
benefit1.description: We bring together young people with older community members, creating opportunities for mutual learning, wisdom sharing and building stronger, more inclusive communities.

benefit2.title: Creative Learning
benefit2.description: Practical learning through various activities - from sports competitions to traditional craft workshops. Knowledge is gained not from books, but through real experience.

benefit3.title: Practical Skills Development
benefit3.description: We create unique spaces where people of different generations can meet, share experiences and learn from each other. Young people gain valuable life lessons, while elders receive fresh ideas and energy.

aboutUs.successDescription1: Since our founding, we have brought together people of various ages and different experiences from all over Lithuania and beyond. Our intergenerational dialogue methods help create long-term relationships and healthier communities.
aboutUs.successDescription2: Through the combination of sports, wellness and cultural exchange, participants develop not only healthier habits, but also stronger social connections and mutual understanding between generations.

programs.title: MORE THAN JUST PROJECTS
programs.description: International Projects Association (TPA) connects different generations through innovative programs focused on healthy lifestyle, cultural exchange and community strengthening. We believe in the power of sharing wisdom and intergenerational collaboration.

activity1.name: Traditional Dish Cooking Workshops
activity1.description: Learn the secrets of Karaim cuisine from experienced chefs and pass this knowledge to the younger generation.
activity1.details: Hands-on workshops where centuries-old Karaim culinary traditions are passed directly from hand to hand. You will learn about the cultural significance of kibinai and other traditional dishes, learn to use fresh local products and apply sustainable food production principles.
activity1.benefits: Cultural preservation|Strengthening intergenerational bonds|Culinary mastery|Sustainable farming principles

activity2.name: Equestrian Therapy
activity2.description: Discover the healing power of equestrian therapy and strengthen your connection with nature in the beautiful Trakai region.
activity2.details: Individualized equestrian therapy sessions that promote emotional balance, improve physical coordination and build confidence around animals. Qualified instructors will help you safely and productively interact with horses in a natural environment, combining therapeutic methods with nature discovery.
activity2.benefits: Psychological well-being|Physical coordination|Confidence building|Connection with nature

activity3.name: Lithuanian Tatar Cultural Treasures
activity3.description: Immerse yourself in the unique cultural heritage of Lithuania's Tatar community through authentic activities and meetings with community members.
activity3.details: An exclusive opportunity to get to know one of Lithuania's oldest ethnic minorities - the Tatar community. Participate in traditional cooking, folk medicine and craft workshops, listen to real life stories and learn how Tatar culture enriched Lithuania's heritage.
activity3.benefits: Cultural dialogue|Traditional knowledge transfer|Community strengthening|Historical memory preservation

activity4.name: Nature Exploration and Wellness Activities
activity4.description: Discover the beauty of nature through active pursuits that strengthen physical and mental health.
activity4.details: Forest therapy sessions, ecological gardening practices and learning the basics of herbalism. Explore local plants and animals together with experienced nature experts and traditional herbalists.
activity4.benefits: Nature knowledge|Stress reduction|Traditional herbalism knowledge|Physical activity

activity5.name: Artisan Chocolate Workshops
activity5.description: Create healthy chocolate treats from quality-selected ingredients together with experienced chocolate masters.
activity5.details: Hands-on workshops where you'll learn to make chocolate from cocoa beans to finished product. You'll learn about the importance of quality ingredients, traditional chocolate-making techniques and healthy nutrition principles in dessert creation.
activity5.benefits: Artisan skills|Healthy nutrition knowledge|Creative thinking|Quality appreciation

activity6.name: Trakai History and Nature Discovery
activity6.description: Combine Trakai history exploration with active recreation in natural surroundings and water sports.
activity6.details: Interactive history tours of Trakai castles, traditional craft workshops and active activities. Participate in boating, hiking through Trakai National Park and storytelling sessions around the campfire.
activity6.location: Trakai Historical National Park and surrounding lakes

contact.title: READY TO JOIN
contact.description: Whether you want to participate in sports activities, take part in projects or help organize events - we look forward to your message. Together we can create even more opportunities!

footer.description: We build bridges between generations through innovative programs that promote healthy lifestyles, cultural exchange and community spirit. We create spaces for intergenerational learning and meaningful connections.
footer.getInvolvedDescription: Want to join our next project or help organize an event?
